entry.title: P2SH status update
entry.summary: In the world of cryptocurrency, two key proposals have been put forth for discussion: BIP16 and BIP17. According to recent data, BIP16 has garnered 37% support while only 4% oppose it. This proposal aims to introduce a new script opcode that will enable new transaction types. On the other hand, BIP17 has received much less support with only 4% in favor and no one opposing it. This proposal suggests a new address format that will improve security by preventing accidental spends. The current address format is prone to errors, and this proposal seeks to address this issue.While both BIP16 and BIP17 have their own merits, it is clear that BIP16 has gained more traction among cryptocurrency enthusiasts. However, it remains to be seen how these proposals will be implemented and whether they will bring about positive changes to the crypto world.
